name: termina
description: Modern terminal emulator with AI integration - Warp-like design for macOS and Linux

scripts.build: npm run prepare:dist && npm run icons && tauri build
scripts.build:debug: npm run prepare:dist && npm run icons && tauri build --debug
scripts.build:mac: npm run prepare:dist && npm run icons && tauri build --target aarch64-apple-darwin
scripts.build:win: npm run prepare:dist && npm run icons && tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc
scripts.build:linux: npm run prepare:dist && npm run icons && tauri build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
scripts.build:all: npm run prepare:dist && npm run icons && tauri build --target aarch64-apple-darwin && tauri build --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc && tauri build --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

author: Termina Team
